solution_line_template: The students need eat {points_needed} vegetables in total because {points_needed} / {points_per_vegetable} = <<{points_needed}/{points_per_vegetable}={total_vegetables_needed}>>{total_vegetables_needed}

Each student needs to eat on average {total_vegetables_needed} vegetables because {total_vegetables_needed} / {num_students} = <<{total_vegetables_needed}/{num_students}={vegetables_per_student_total}>>{vegetables_per_student_total}

Each student needs to eat {vegetables_per_student_total} vegetables per school week because {vegetables_per_student_total} / {num_school_weeks} = <<{vegetables_per_student_total}/{num_school_weeks}={avg_vegetables_per_student_per_week}>>{avg_vegetables_per_student_per_week}
